duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to product development using Python, JavaScript, and other web or application development frameworks.
Work on API integration, especially RESTful APIs.
Utilize basic knowledge of NLP concepts and integrate them into the application flow.
Apply skills in database design, querying, and management (SQL, NoSQL).
Collaborate with the team on frontend and backend development of web-based applications.
Utilize cloud services such as AWS, GCP, or Azure for application deployment and management.
Apply AI-based automation knowledge to enhance development processes.
Communicate effectively with the team and stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
